mapper.sql: id, record_no, type, operate_type, sn, warehouse_id, operator, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time, remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_asset_warehouse_record(record_no, type, operate_type, sn, warehouse_id, operator, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time, remark) values
(#{item.recordNo},#{item.type},#{item.operateType}, #{item.sn}, #{item.warehouseId}, #{item.operator}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_asset_warehouse_record
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} and del_flag = 0
and type = #{type}
and sn like concat('%', #{sn}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
limit #{offset}, #{size}
